name: Eye of the Storm
text: If this card is activated: You can discard 1 Reptile monster, Special Summon 1 "Loud Cloud" monster from your Deck, but for the rest of the turn you cannot Special Summon monsters except for Reptile monsters. You can activate the effects of "Loud Cloud" cards as Quick Effects during either player’s turn. If this card is in the GY, you can treat this card as both a FIRE and WIND monster.
